import re
from collections import Counter

def count_words(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('', '', string).lower()
    words = cleaned_string.split()
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    return word_counts

import re
from collections import Counter

def count_words(string):
    cleaned_string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', string).lower()
    words = cleaned_string.split()
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    return word_counts
